website_baseurl_help.message: URL of the homepage of this website in its reference language.

website_indexpage_help.message: The home page is selected from the web site's functions screen.

website_notification_sitemap_url_creatio.message: "$WEBSITE$" sitemap URL for "$LCID$" local was generated

website_sitemap_help.message: If you enable the sitemap generation, an index file will be automatically generated for each language of the web site, by using documents SEO informations (configure them via module SEO).

topic_website_help.message: The website this topic belongs to.

topic_indexpage_help.message: The index page is selected from the web site's functions screen.

topic_pathpart_help.message: Path used in the URL for this topic.

topic_section_no_function.message: no function is configured for this section.

topic_section_function.message: This section has the following function:

topic_section_functions.message: This section has the {} following functions:

page_ttl_help.message: Specify a duration in seconds, or 0 to disable the cache

sectionpagefunction_create.message: associate a function to a section

sectionpagefunction_error_not_unique.message: $CODE$ function is performed by another page in this section.

section_functions_list_tip.message:
The list below displays the functions assigned to this section.
To add a function to a section, you must first choose a functional page, and then choose functions among those supported by the selected page.

function_is_already_used_in_section.message: this function is already performed in this section.

no_page_use_selected_function.message: no page performs the selected function.

pages_for_choosen_function.message: list of pages performing the selected function

page_can_also_use_these_functions.message: the page can also perform the following functions

staticpage_section_help.message: The topic or web site that contains the page.

open_page_editor_warning.message:
This form contains unsaved changes.
  • By clicking Yes,changes will be saved and you will be redirected to the page editor.
  • By clicking No, this popup will be dismissed and no harm will be done :)

section_permission_rule_helper.message: choose to restrict access in this section to users or groups of users. If there is no selected group or user, access is considered to be public

menu_website_picker_title.message: select the website of the menu

menu_this_menu_is_empty_help.message: Use the Add list below to add entries to this menu.

menu_add_document_item.message: add an entry pointing to a document

menu_add_document_item_help.message: You can select a publishable document. After choosing a document, it is possible to change the title to display in the menu.

menu_add_url_item.message: add an entry pointing to a URL

menu_add_url_item_help.message: Use this mode to include links to external pages to the web site. For a link to an internal URL, use the form above.

menu_select_document_to_add_to_menu.message: select a document to add to the menu

menu_add_this_element.message: add this item to the menu

menu_menus_are_grouped_by_website.message:
Menus are classified by web site.
Choose a web site to access the menus attached to him.

functionalpage_website_help.message: The website this page belongs to.

functionalpage_website_picker_title.message: select the website for this page

functional_page_editor_help.message:
This page is a functional page: it is used to display other contents in the website.
To configure the functions this page supports, click on Functions in the menu on the left.

functional_page_list_help.message: The functional pages are used to display contents coming from different modules, such as news or products.

all_functions_list.message:
Here is the list of all available functions.
Functions already supported by this page are selected in the list below. Select the functions you want to associate to this page.

page_contains_blocks_for_following_funct.message: This page currently holds the required blocks to support the following functions:

page_contains_no_function.message:
This page supports no functions.

To fix this, you can edit the page contents.

page_contains_required_blocks.message: This page holds all the required blocks to support the selected functions.

following_functions_cannot_be_supported_.message: The following functions won't work correctly because the page does not hold the required blocks:

edit_page_contents_to_fix_this.message: To fix this, you can edit the page contents.

block_properties.description: Used as title in the block properties box in the page editor (left column).
